pkgmetadata.longdescription: Random Ferns Classifier // Provides the random ferns classifier by Ozuysal, Calonder, Lepetit and Fua (2009) doi:10.1109/TPAMI.2009.23, modified for generic and multi-label classification and featuring OOB error approximation and importance measure as introduced in Kursa (2014) doi:10.18637/jss.v061.i10.
